verses.verse: And it shall be, when thou art come <S%H935>in<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, and <S%H3423>possessest<s%> it, and <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> therein;

That thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H7225>first<s%> of all the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>, which thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> of thy <S%H776>land<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee, and shalt <S%H7760>put<s%> it in a <S%H2935>basket<s%>, and shalt <S%H1980>go<s%> unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7931>place<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> there.

And thou shalt <S%H935>go<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%> that shall be in those <S%H3117>days<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto him, I <S%H5046>profess<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, that I am <S%H935>come<s%> unto the <S%H776>country<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto our <S%H1>fathers<s%> for to <S%H5414>give<s%> us.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H2935>basket<s%> out of thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and set it <S%H3240>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6030>speak<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, A <S%H761>Syrian<s%> ready to <S%H6>perish<s%> was my <S%H1>father<s%>, and he went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> there <S%H4962>with<s%> a <S%H4592>few<s%>, and became there a <S%H1471>nation<s%>, <S%H1419>great<s%>, <S%H6099>mighty<s%>, and <S%H7227>populous<s%>:
And the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> evil <S%H7489>entreated<s%> us, and <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> us, and <S%H5414>laid<s%> upon us <S%H7186>hard<s%> <S%H5656>bondage<s%>:

And when we <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> our <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H7200>looked<s%> on our <S%H6040>affliction<s%>, and our <S%H5999>labour<s%>, and our <S%H3906>oppression<s%>:

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> brought us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>, and with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4172>terribleness<s%>, and with <S%H226>signs<s%>, and with <S%H4159>wonders<s%>:

And he hath <S%H935>brought<s%> us into this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and hath <S%H5414>given<s%> us this <S%H776>land<s%>, even a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>.

And now, behold, I have <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H6529>firstfruits<s%> <S%H7225><s%> of the <S%H127>land<s%>, which thou, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, hast <S%H5414>given<s%> me. And thou shalt <S%H3240>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>:

And thou shalt <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in every <S%H2896>good<s%> thing which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> unto thee, and unto thine <S%H1004>house<s%>, thou, and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%>, and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

When thou hast made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H6237>tithing<s%> all the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> of thine <S%H8393>increase<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, which is the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4643>tithing<s%>, and hast <S%H5414>given<s%> it unto the <S%H3881>Levite<s%>, the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and the <S%H490>widow<s%>, that they may <S%H398>eat<s%> within thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>, and be <S%H7646>filled<s%>;

Then thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, I have brought <S%H1197>away<s%> the hallowed <S%H6944>things<s%> out of mine <S%H1004>house<s%>, and also have <S%H5414>given<s%> them unto the <S%H3881>Levite<s%>, and unto the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, to the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and to the <S%H490>widow<s%>, according to all thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which thou hast <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me: I have not <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, neither have I <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> them:

I have not <S%H398>eaten<s%> thereof in my <S%H205>mourning<s%>, neither have I taken <S%H1197>away<s%> ought thereof for any <S%H2931>unclean<s%> use, nor <S%H5414>given<s%> ought thereof for the <S%H4191>dead<s%>: but I have <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, and have <S%H6213>done<s%> according to all that thou hast <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me.

Look <S%H8259>down<s%> from thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation<s%>, from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H1288>bless<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and the <S%H127>land<s%> which thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> us, as thou <S%H7650>swarest<s%> unto our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>.

This <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee to <S%H6213>do<s%> these <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%>: thou shalt therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them with all thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and with all thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

Thou hast <S%H559>avouched<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> to be thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and his <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and to <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto his <S%H6963>voice<s%>:

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H559>avouched<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%> to be his <S%H5459>peculiar<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, as he hath <S%H1696>promised<s%> thee, and that thou shouldest <S%H8104>keep<s%> all his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>;

And to <S%H5414>make<s%> thee <S%H5945>high<s%> above all <S%H1471>nations<s%> which he hath <S%H6213>made<s%>, in <S%H8416>praise<s%>, and in <S%H8034>name<s%>, and in <S%H8597>honour<s%>; and that thou mayest be an <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, as he hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.
